cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Target opponent may have you create a Treasure token. If they don't Tibarro, Loan Shark deals 2 damage to any target.
[0]: Until your next turn, Tibarro becomes a 4/4 red and green Shark creature with indestructible and menace.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “If a creature would deal combat damage to you, prevent half of it, rounded down. If damage is prevented this way, this emblem deals that much damage to that creature's controller.”
